mapper.insert: insert into COMPARE_SAME_RESULT (ID, CASE_ID, PANEL_ID, REFERENCE_ID, SAMPLE_NO, COMPARE_BOARD_NO, COMPARE_GENE_SUM, COMPARE_TOTAL_PROBABILITY, COMPARE_POPULATION_ID, MATCH_LIMIT, TOLERANCE, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{panelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compareBoardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compareGeneSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{compareTotalProbability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comparePopulationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tolerance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update COMPARE_SAME_RESULT set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PANEL_ID = #{panelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_NO = #{sampleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPARE_BOARD_NO = #{compareBoardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPARE_GENE_SUM = #{compareGeneSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPARE_TOTAL_PROBABILITY = #{compareTotalProbability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPARE_POPULATION_ID = #{comparePopulationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATCH_LIMIT = #{matchLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOLERANCE = #{tolerance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CASE_ID, PANEL_ID, REFERENCE_ID, SAMPLE_NO, COMPARE_BOARD_NO, COMPARE_GENE_SUM, COMPARE_TOTAL_PROBABILITY, COMPARE_POPULATION_ID, MATCH_LIMIT, TOLERANCE, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON from COMPARE_SAME_RESULT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select csr.*, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as sampleNo, lsid.SAMPLE_FLAG as sampleFlag, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as sampleName from COMPARE_SAME_RESULT csr left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_NO = csr.SAMPLE_NO where csr.CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsid.delete_flag='0' order by lsid.sample_flag,csr.SAMPLE_NO asc

select distinct csr.reference_id,lsid.sample_flag as sampleFlag,csr.reference_id as SAMPLE_NO from COMPARE_SAME_RESULT csr left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_NO = csr.reference_id where csr.CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsid.delete_flag='0' order by lsid.sample_flag desc, csr.reference_id asc

select ID, CASE_ID, PANEL_ID, REFERENCE_ID, SAMPLE_NO, COMPARE_BOARD_NO, COMPARE_GENE_SUM, COMPARE_TOTAL_PROBABILITY, COMPARE_POPULATION_ID, MATCH_LIMIT, TOLERANCE, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON from COMPARE_SAME_RESULT
